review: I was so excited to finally order my Amazon Fire TV box. When it finally arrived I couldn't wait to hook it up! As an Amazon Prime member I was instantly able to enjoy all of the extras provided to a Prime member. I couldn't have been more surprised at everything available on the Fire TV box! The box is easy to use and it's simple to navigate the many options. I love the voice control option and I was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. I'm so glad I made the decision to purchase the Fire TV box.
author: Mande Sumner

review: I was pleased except for one thing, the spotify app that amazon chose for fire tv will not operate alone, it only works with a tablet or phone. I have also roku, my roku does not need anything else, neither does the smart tv itself, I like the tone of music on FireTv they have improved it a lot from the beginning so I want to use that but I should have to involve another device like a phone or tablet, that makes it a pain, then you have to pair them etc, kinda loses the moment sometimes
author: Gerald Klein

review: I did a little research after deciding to cut ties with the satellite company and landed on this little nifty box. The apps are easy to download, including; Netflix, Slingtv, and Plutotv. The remote is super responsive and easy to handle.  I have yet to find something that irks me on the Amazon Fire Tv setup but so far I am completely satisfied. We are planning on buying a second for our basement tv setup once they have them in stock again.
author: L. Crane "DizzyMizzy"
